form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR IMMIGRANT VISA AND ALIEN REGISTRATION, 4-1502

full_text: FS Form Approved. (8-17-39 Budget Bureau No. 47-R150.2. DEPARTMENT OF STATE FOREIGN SERVICE OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA APPLICATION FOR IMMIGRANT VISA AND ALIEN REGISTRATION INSTRUCTIONS: This form must be filled out in DUPLICATE by typewriter, or if by hand in legible block letters. ALL questions must be answered, if applicable. Questions which are not applicable should be so marked. If there is insufficient room on the form, answer on separate sheets, in duplicate using the same numbers as appear on the form. Attach the sheets to the forms. DO NOT SIGN this form until instructed to do so by the consular officer. The fee for filing this application for an immigrant visa if $5.00. The fee should be paid in United States dollars or local currency equivalent or by bank draft, when you appear before the consular officer. WARNING: Any false statement or concealment of a material fact may result in your permanent exclusion from the United States. Even though you should be admitted to the United States, a fraudulent entry could be ground for your prosecution and/or deportation. I hereby apply for an DUBLIN immigrant visa and alien registration at the United States LEGATION EMBASSY at IRELAND and state the following facts: 1. My family name is My first name is My middle name is KILKELLY (MRS) MARY JOSEPHINE 2. My full name in native alphabet (If other than Roman letters are used) is AS IN No1. 3. Other names I have used or by which I have been known are (If married woman, give maiden name) 4. The date of my birth is NONE nee of LALLY birth is 5. My place (Day) (Month) (Year) (City or town) (Province) (Country) 5 July 1903 60 GALWAY IRELAND 6. My age is 58 7. My present calling or occupation is HOUSEWIFE 8. My present address is RYEHILL MONIVEA ATHENRY Go. GALWAY. 9. My sex is 10. My marital status is Single (never married) Married Widowed Divorced Separated Male Female Including my present marriage, I have been married ONCE times. 11. My nationality is 12. My race is 13. My ethnic classification is IRISH WHITE IRISH 14. My personal description is 15. I have the following visible marks of identification (a) Color of hair (c) Height GREY 4-11-2 feet inches NONE (b) eyes GREY Color of (d) Complexion FRESH 16. My purpose in going to the United States is To VISIT MY SON and MY SISTER. 17. I intend to remain in the United States permanently or (Give length of 18. I intend to enter the United States at the port of time) ABOUT 18 MONTHS BOSTON 19. I (Do) (Do Not) have a ticket to my final destination 20. (a) I am going to the United States to join the following person (Give name 20. (b) I am sponsored by the following person and/or organization (Give and address and relationship, if any) address if different from (a)) MY SON.- THOMAS KILKELLY MY SISTER MISS K. LALLY 104 LINE ST. SOMERVILLE 9 PARK VALE AVE MASS. ALLSTEN 34 - BOSTON 21. My final address in the United States is 22. My personal financial resources are 104 LINE ST. SOMERVILLE, MASS. ABOUT 300 HOUSE affrox (a) Cash (c) Real estate (value) (b) Bank deposits NONE (d) Other LAND THIS FORM MAY BE OBTAINED GRATIS AT CONSULAR OFFICES OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA
